1: @@@/ /phyug gsung pa'i rgyal // rnam rgyas pad+ma dkar po 'i sbyan // pad+ma rab tu rgyas ba'i zhal // rang gi lag gis rdo rje
2: mchog / yang dang yang du gsor byed pa // khro gnyir ldan pa'i rlabs la sogs / / lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa // dpa' bo
3: gdul dka' 'dul ba po // dpa' bo 'jigs rung gzugs can dang // rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba // rang gi ;ag gis gsor byed
4: pa // shes rab thabs dang snying rje che // 'gro don byed pa rnams kyi mchog / dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can // khro
5: bo 'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa // sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon lus btud rnams dang lhan cog tu // mgon
6: po bzom ldan bzhin gshegs // rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal te // thal mo sbyar ba byas gyur nas //
